      • cacheOrGet

        public static <K,V> V cacheOrGet(java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentMap<K,V> map,
                                 K key,
                                 V defaultValue)
        Returns:
        defaultValue if there is no entry in the map (in that case defaultValue is placed into the map), or corresponding value if entry already exists.

      • cacheOrGet

        public static <T> T cacheOrGet(java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicReference<T> ref,
                               T defaultValue)
        Returns:
        defaultValue if the reference contains null (in that case defaultValue is placed there), or reference value otherwise.
